verses.text: \w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w*, seeing \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* ministration, according \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w obtained|strong="G2192"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w*, \w we|strong="G3778"\w* faint \w not|strong="G3756"\w*;

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w we|strong="G3588"\w* renounce \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w hidden|strong="G2927"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* dishonesty, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w walking|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w craftiness|strong="G3834"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \w adulterating|strong="G1389"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w manifestation|strong="G5321"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w commending|strong="G4921"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man’s|strong="G0444"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w sight|strong="G1799"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hid, \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* hid \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w lost|strong="G0622"\w*,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w god|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w* hath \w blinded|strong="G5186"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w minds|strong="G3540"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w unbelievers|strong="G0571"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w light|strong="G5462"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w should|strong="G2316"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* shine unto \w them|strong="G1722"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G1161"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* commanded \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w shine|strong="G2989"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, hath \w shined|strong="G2989"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w give|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w treasure|strong="G2344"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w earthen|strong="G3749"\w* \w vessels|strong="G4632"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* excellency \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w us|strong="G1537"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* we \w suffer|strong="G2346"\w* tribulation, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* distressed; we \w are|strong="G3956"\w* straitened, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* destitute;

We suffer persecution, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* are \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w forsaken|strong="G1459"\w*; we are cast \w down|strong="G2598"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* we \w perish|strong="G0622"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*:

\w Always|strong="G3842"\w* bearing \w about|strong="G1722"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* mortification \w of|strong="G4983"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G4983"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G5319"\w* \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w bodies|strong="G4983"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w always|strong="G0104"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* unto \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w Jesus’|strong="G2424"\w* \w sake|strong="G1223"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G5319"\w* \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w mortal|strong="G2349"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.

\w So|strong="G1161"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* worketh \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w as|strong="G2596"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* cause \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w*; \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*, \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* cause \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*:

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w will|strong="G2962"\w* \w raise|strong="G1453"\w* \w us|strong="G1453"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w place|strong="G1473"\w* \w us|strong="G1453"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w your|strong="G3956"\w* \w sakes|strong="G1223"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w abounding|strong="G4052"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*, \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G2532"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* cause \w we|strong="G2249"\w* faint \w not|strong="G3756"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w though|strong="G1487"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* outward \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G0444"\w* \w corrupted|strong="G1311"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* inward \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G0444"\w* \w renewed|strong="G0341"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w by|strong="G2250"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w that|strong="G2596"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w present|strong="G2596"\w* \w momentary|strong="G3910"\w* \w and|strong="G1391"\w* \w light|strong="G1645"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w our|strong="G2596"\w* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w*, worketh \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w us|strong="G1519"\w* above \w measure|strong="G5236"\w* exceedingly \w an|strong="G2596"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w weight|strong="G0922"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w While|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w look|strong="G0991"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w at|strong="G0991"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w seen|strong="G0991"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w at|strong="G0991"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w seen|strong="G0991"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w seen|strong="G0991"\w*, \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w temporal|strong="G4340"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w seen|strong="G0991"\w*, \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w*.
